Name: Dig Down
About the game: Dig Down is a fun and challenging digging and treasure-hunting roguelike adventure game. In each world you visit, you must dig as deep as possible before either your pick loses durability and breaks or you run out of time and get crushed. Each dig will see you face increasingly challenging monsters, traps and the opportunities to seek out precious gold and ores to upgrade your equipment, and find rare items you can trade in each world's marketplace. As you amass wealth and improve your equipment you will be able to dig deeper and deeper, beating your previous depth records and finding increasingly rare treasure. • Use the mouse or keyboard to move, dig and attack monsters • Mine ores to upgrade your equipment to improve your ability to dig further and fight monsters better • Find rare items in treasure chests or dropped by monsters to trade in the market • Buy items low and sell them high in different worlds to make gold for profit • Spend your gold on upgrades, hats and skins • Challenge yourself to dig as deep as possible, and beat your own records How deep can you dig?
